Best fucking legal document ever!

By Dan walmsley August 05, 2003 Permalink

The Smoking Gun, an archive of publicly accessible documents, has awarded its Legal Document of the Year award: Fuck, it’s a good one. I’m sure we’ve all read breakdowns of the origins and variations of the word Fuck, but not all of us have the balls to submit them to a District Attorney.

While you’re at it, check out the awesome cosmic justice smacked down on a drunken groom at his bucks’ night.

Oh yes, and someone who won’t have much trouble paying his speeding fine.

This site is hilarious!
